```{r}
install.packages("pacman")
pacman::p_load(stargazer)
```


Set working directory and load the data file

```{r}
setwd("~/Documents/GitHub/econ172/pset2/source")
q1data <- read.csv("../data/q1.csv", stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
```

Get summary statistics

```{r}
stargazer(q1data)
```

Check if variables balanced

```{r}
age <- lm(student_age ~ treatment, data = q1data)
sex <- lm(student_female ~ treatment, data = q1data)
wealth <- lm(BL_ses_index ~ treatment, data = q1data)
math <- lm(BL_math_percent ~ treatment, data = q1data)
hindi <- lm(BL_hindi_percent ~ treatment, data = q1data)

stargazer(age, sex, wealth, math, hindi)
```

Estimate impact of the treatment on math and Hindi scores at endline

```{r}
math <- lm(EL_math_percent ~ treatment, data = q1data)
hindi <- lm(EL_hindi_percent ~ treatment, data = q1data)

stargazer(math, hindi)
```
